$schema.description: Url to the json schema definition to validate this file

tokenLength.description: Defines the length for the generated user tokens

tokenLifetime.description: Defines how many minutes will the user tokens be alive before expiring

storage.description: Describes where the data related to this library is stored. Different ways of saving the users and all their related information are available

turbodepot.description: Configures a turbodepot storage source where the users data will be stored

setup.description: Defines the path to the turbodepot.json file that contains the setup for the turbodepot library we want to use

source.description: Specifies the name for one of the turbodepot library sources that will be used to store and read the users data

depotName.description: Specifies the name for the depot on the selected turbodepot source that will be used to store and read the users data
